item.title: Open Jam 2019 theme announcement
item.description: Join the jam at Open Jam 2019!

item.title: Open Jam 2019 is ON!
item.description: Mark your calendar! Open Jam 2019 will take place this September 27-30. Here is the schedule (times are automatically localized to your timezone). September 27 2019 1:00 PM EDT, the jam begins! We will announce the theme. … 80 hours of creativity! … September 30 2019 9:00 PM EDT, the jam concludes. For the week after the jam ends, you’ll peer-review the other submitted games and rate them in categories like fun, graphics, audio, etc.
